changeSet.author: cconey
changeSet.createView: select `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`.`cardcategorymapId` AS `cardcategorymapId`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`.`pageInsert` AS `pageInsert`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`.`cardpageId` AS `cardpageId`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`.`cardId` AS `cardId`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`.`rank` AS `rank` from `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cardpagemap_ccg`

select `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`program_id` AS `program_id`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`program_name` AS `program_name`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`issuer_id` AS `issuer_id`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`program_default` AS `program_default`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`date_created` AS `date_created`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`deleted` AS `deleted`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`.`private` AS `private` from `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`programs`

select `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`mapid` AS `mapid`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`siteid` AS `siteid`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`masterpageid` AS `masterpageid`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`subpageid` AS `subpageid`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`hide` AS `hide`, `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`.`rank` AS `rank` from `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_pagesubpagemap_ccg`

select `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`default_commission` AS `default_commission`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_page_map`.`cardpageId` AS `category_id`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`commission_label` AS `commission_label`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`payout_cap` AS `payout_cap`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`card_level_id` AS `card_level_id`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`status` AS `status`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`cardId` AS `cardId`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`cardTitle` AS `cardTitle`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details`.`cardDetailText` AS `cardDetailText`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details`.`cardLink` AS `cardLink`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`imagePath` AS `imagePath`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`url` AS `url`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details`.`cardIntroDetail` AS `cardIntroDetail`, cast(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`dateCreated` as date) AS `dateCreated`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`introApr`,'@@introApr@@',`cms_card_data`.`introApr`) AS `introApr`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`introApr` AS `q_introApr`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`regularApr`,'@@regularApr@@',`cms_card_data`.`regularApr`) AS `regularApr`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`regularApr` AS `q_regularApr`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`introAprPeriod`,'@@introAprPeriod@@',`cms_card_data`.`introAprPeriod`) AS `introAprPeriod`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`introAprPeriod` AS `q_introAprPeriod`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`annualFee`,'@@annualFee@@',`cms_card_data`.`annualFee`) AS `annualFee`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`annualFee` AS `q_annualFee`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`monthlyFee`,'@@monthlyFee@@',`cms_card_data`.`monthlyFee`) AS `monthlyFee`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`monthlyFee` AS `q_monthlyFee`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`balanceTransfers`,'@@balanceTransfers@@',convert(if((`cms_card_data`.`balanceTransfers` = 1),'Yes','N/A') using latin1)) AS `balanceTransfers`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`balanceTransfers` AS `q_balanceTransfers`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`balanceTransfers`,'@@balanceTransfers@@',convert(if((`cms_card_data`.`balanceTransfers` = 1),'Yes','No') using latin1)) AS `balanceTransferFee`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`balanceTransferFee` AS `q_balanceTransferFee`, replace(`cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`creditNeeded`,'@@creditNeeded@@',convert((case `cms_card_data`.`creditNeeded` when 0 then 'No Credit Check' when 1 then 'Bad Credit' when 2 then 'Fair Credit' when 3 then 'Good Credit' when 4 then 'Excellent Credit' end) using latin1)) AS `creditNeeded`, `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`creditNeeded` AS `q_creditNeeded` from `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards` on `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`cardId` = `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`card_id` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details` on `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`cardId` = `cms_card_details`.`cardId` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data` on `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details`.`cardId` = `cms_card_data`.`cardId` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_page_map` on `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_data`.`cardId` = `cms_card_page_map`.`cardId` join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map` on `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map`.`cardpageId` = `cms_card_page_map`.`cardpageId` where `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`active` = 1 and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`syndicate` = 1 and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_cards`.`deleted` <> 1 and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`status` = 'ACTIVE' and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_cards`.`deleted` <> 1 and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_details`.`cardDetailVersion` = -1 and `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map`.`categoryId` = 25 order by `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_page_map`.`rank`

select `t`.`transid` AS `transid`, `t`.`transtype` AS `transtype`, `t`.`dateinserted` AS `dateinserted`, `t`.`quantity` AS `quantity`, `t`.`estimatedrevenue` AS `estimatedrevenue`, `t`.`bannerid` AS `bannerid`, (case `t`.`exit` when NULL then 0 when 1415 then 1077 when 1397 then 11 when 1398 then 12 when 1399 then 13 when 1400 then 14 when 1406 then 15 when 1407 then 16 when 1408 then 17 when 1410 then 18 when 1409 then 19 when 1414 then 20 when 1416 then 21 when 1417 then 22 when 1418 then 23 when 1420 then 25 when 1421 then 26 when 1422 then 27 when 1423 then 28 when 1424 then 30 when 1425 then 31 when 1426 then 32 when 1419 then 39 when 1413 then 74 when 1412 then 75 when 1411 then 76 when 1401 then 77 when 1402 then 78 when 1403 then 79 when 1404 then 80 when 1405 then 82 when 1427 then 979 when 1478 then 1477 else `t`.`exit` end) AS `exit_page_id`, (case `t`.`data3` when NULL then 'Unmatched' when 0 then 'Unmatched' when 1 then 'Matched' else 'Unmatched' end) AS `card_match` from `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`transactions` `t` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_affiliates` `pa` on `t`.`affiliateid` = `pa`.`affiliate_id` where `pa`.`affiliate_type` like 'TRAFFIC_SOURCE' and `t`.`affiliateid` <> 'bf97ede0'

select `cl`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`, `cl`.`website_id` AS `website_id`, `cl`.`card_id` AS `card_id`, `cl`.`date` AS `date_inserted`, ifnull(`co`.`approvalSalesCount`, 0) AS `saleClickCount`, '0' AS `nonSaleClickCount`, ifnull(`co`.`applicationSalesCount`,0) AS `applicationsCount`, ifnull(`co`.`crossSaleCount`,0) AS `crossSaleCount`, ifnull(`cl`.`totalclicks`,0) AS `totalClicks`, ifnull(`co`.`totalcommission`,0) AS `totalCommission`, ifnull(`co`.`totalAdjustment`,0) AS `totalAdjustment`, ifnull(`rs`.`sales_rev`,0) AS `totalRevenue`, '0' AS `nonSalesClickCommission`, '0' AS `salesClickCommission` from `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`click_summary` `cl` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`commission_summary` `co` on `co`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id` and `co`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id` and `co`.`date` = `cl`.`date` and `co`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`revenue_summary` `rs` on `rs`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id` and `rs`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id` and `rs`.`post_date` = `cl`.`date` and `rs`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id`

select `cl`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`, `cl`.`website_id` AS `website_id`, `cl`.`card_id` AS `card_id`, `cl`.`date` AS `date_inserted`, ifnull(`co`.`approvalSalesCount`,0) AS `saleClickCount`, '0' AS `nonSaleClickCount`, ifnull(`co`.`applicationSalesCount`,0) AS `applicationsCount`, ifnull(`co`.`crossSaleCount`,0) AS `crossSaleCount`, ifnull(`cl`.`totalclicks`,0) AS `totalClicks`, ifnull(`co`.`totalcommission`,0) AS `totalCommission`, ifnull(`co`.`totalAdjustment`,0) AS `totalAdjustment`, '0' AS `nonSalesClickCommission`, '0' AS `salesClickCommission` from `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`click_summary` `cl` left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`commission_summary` `co` on `co`.`affiliate_id` = `cl`.`affiliate_id` and `co`.`card_id` = `cl`.`card_id` and `co`.`date` = `cl`.`date` and `co`.`website_id` = `cl`.`website_id`
